H0.text: Who had a hit in 1966 with When a Man Loves a Woman. Otis Redding

H1.text: Who had a hit in 1966 with When a Man Loves a Woman. Wilson Pickett

H2.text: Who had a hit in 1966 with When a Man Loves a Woman. Sam Cooke

H3.text: Who had a hit in 1966 with When a Man Loves a Woman. Percy sledge

A4.text: He is best known for the song 'When a Man Loves a Woman', a No. 1 hit on both the Billboard Hot 100 and R&B singles charts in 1966.

A5.text: It was awarded a million-selling, gold-certified disc from the RIAA.
